name: Code Museum - A Source Code Editor Specializing Only in Reading
description: Code Museum is a source code editor that deliberately omits the "writing function" found in typical editors, focusing instead on "reading functions." It offers various features for reading, such as range execution and GPT-based functionalities. By using this editor, users can reduce the time spent reading code and enhance productivity.
